CBRE is pleased to offer a 24,375 SF warehouse space available for sublease at 44 Rose Street in Springfield, Massachusetts.

This space is located in an industrial area of Springfield with great proximity to Interstate 291, Interstate 90 (Mass Pike) and just minutes to Interstate 91 servicing the intersection of New England. This building is currently offering sublease space from a national solid waste collection firm.
